text: Then some began to spit on him, to blindfold him, and to beat him, saying to him, “14:65 Prophesy! ¦ Prophesy to us! Who is it that struck yoʋ? ANTProphesy!” And the officers 14:65 kept striking him with the palms of their hands 55.1% ¦ struck him with the palms of their hands ANT BYZ 37% ¦ received him with slaps CT 5.7%kept striking him with the palms of their hands.
